ref: 9149 babhrú ʻ reddish brown ʼ RV., babhruká -- ʻ brownish ʼ ŚBr. (babhruśá -- Pāṇ.gaṇa, babhluśá -- VS.). 2. As name of an animal bábhruka -- m. ʻ ichneumon ʼ VS., babhru -- m. MBh.
Si. bam̆baru, ˚buru ʻ purple or brown colour ʼ; --
Bi. babhnī ʻ light red soil ʼ (< *babhru -- la -- dissim. to *babhruna -- ?).
